control_attributes.control_description: The organization plans for the transfer of essential missions and business functions to alternate processing and/or storage sites with little or no loss of operational continuity and sustains that continuity through information system restoration to primary processing and/or storage sites.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to more thoroughly and effectively test the contingency plan.

Control Statement: The organization plans for the transfer of essential missions and business functions to alternate processing and/or storage sites with little or no loss of operational continuity and sustains that continuity through information system restoration to primary processing and/or storage sites.
